comments:
class TestSuper0 {
  void foo() {
  }
}

public class TestSuper extends TestSuper0 {
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    new TestSuper().foo();
  }
  void foo() {
    System.out.println();  // <-- breakpoint
  }
}

Fixed.
This bug was introduce while adding the support for varargs methods, it was the
little brother of bug 76860.

Changes in ASTInstructionCompiler#visit(SuperMethodInvocation).
